import React, { useState,useEffect } from 'react'; import './style.css'; import { useLocation } from 'react-router'; import { Card, Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Modal, ModalBody } from 'reactstrap'; import ModalHeader from 'react-bootstrap/esm/ModalHeader'; import pdffile from '../../img/pdflogo.png' const ResultPage = () =>{ const location = useLocation(); const data = location.state; const [dataPost, setDataPost] = useState({ title: '', author: '', nim: '', lecture1: '', lecture2: '', year: '', file: data.filename, }); const [modalSave, setModalSave] = useState(false); const checking = data.result <= 30; if (checking) { return(

PLAGIARISM CHECKER

{data.data}

{data.result}

% Indicated

You're safe, click the safe button to save the file to the database.

Save
) } else { return(

PLAGIARISM CHECKER

{data.data}

{data.result}

% Indicated

Sorry you're danger, we can't forward your files to our database

) } } export default ResultPage;
